name: Soarin' Mag (GMTK Jam 2017)
description:
You control Mag, the magnetic robot, on his mission to find and retrieve the Core.

You'll use your magnetism to fling yourself through the air, hurl metal balls at crumbling walls, and pull the Core back to its recovery point!

USE CHROME FOR THE GAMEJAM BUILD - the code is not perfectly optimized (read: uses naive/inefficient algorithms), and we found that Chrome ran MUCH better than Firefox.
